text: [Charlie]: I saw Alice vent in Electrical.
[Dave]: Let's hear Alice's side of the story about being in Electrical, and can anyone else confirm Charlie's claim or Alice's movements?
[Bob]: Charlie, can you clarify exactly when you saw Alice vent in Electrical, because timing might help us verify her movements?
[Alice]: I was in Admin the whole time, completing tasks and didn't go to Electrical at all; Charlie's claim is false.
[Charlie]: It was right after I saw Bob leave Electrical, and I'm sure it was Alice venting because she was wearing that distinctive red spacesuit.
[Dave]: Bob, since you were mentioned as leaving Electrical, did you notice anything unusual or anyone else in the area at the time?

[Bob]: I was actually in the Cafeteria the entire time, completing the task with the coffee maker, so I didn't see anything in Electrical, and Charlie, your claim about seeing me leave Electrical is incorrect.
[Alice]: Charlie seems to be fabricating stories, as both Bob and I have solid alibis, and his timeline doesn't match up with our movements.
[Charlie]: My apologies, everyone; I must have mistaken someone else for Alice – the lighting in Electrical is tricky, and with the similar-colored suits, it's easy to get confused.
[Dave]: Erin, since you were in the Cafeteria with us, did you notice any unusual behavior or anyone leaving that could help clarify movements?
[Bob]: Erin, since you were doing the task in the Cafeteria, can you confirm seeing Alice leave for Admin and not Electrical?
[Alice]: I appreciate Charlie's retraction, but we should still be cautious and observe his actions closely moving forward, as false accusations can be suspicious.
[Charlie]: Perhaps Erin can corroborate Alice's alibi, or maybe she saw something else entirely; Erin, do you remember seeing Alice head to Admin?
[Dave]: Erin, your perspective is crucial here—did you see Alice head towards Admin, and did anything else catch your eye that could help us resolve this confusion?
[Bob]: Erin, can you confirm Alice's movement to Admin from Cafeteria? This would help clear up the timeline and validate Alice's claim.
[Alice]: Erin, could you please confirm if you saw me leaving the Cafeteria for Admin? This would help clarify the timeline and substantiate my alibi.
[Charlie]: Yes, I saw Alice leave the Cafeteria and head towards Admin; I was focused on my tasks in Cafeteria, so I didn't see anyone else besides Alice.
[Dave]: Let's focus on completing our tasks and keeping an eye on any suspicious activity, and if anyone notices anything unusual, please report it immediately.
[Bob]: Erin, your confirmation about Alice's movements is crucial right now; did you see her head towards Admin from the Cafeteria?
[Alice]: Erin, your confirmation about my movements is crucial; did you see me heading towards Admin from the Cafeteria?
